title: Otokonoko no Kimochi
sinopse:
"When I see you the one I love, my chest becomes painful. However, I still want to be--"

Shuuya who works as a secretary for the student council, likes council president Misaki. But his girlfriend is Shuuya's bestfriend that's what Shinji thought. One day, Misaki confessed to Shinji but was caught by Shuuya.
